title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers praise the cashmere hoodie's quality, softness, and lightweight fabric, with one noting it's perfect for cool winter nights in Florida.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just right
items.body: This was not very soft when I first put it on but it softened up a LOT with the first washing. I think over time it will get better and better. I am 5'7" and 130 lbs. Ordered a large because my arms are really long and I hate it when the sleeves are too short. Luckily this fits perfectly. The zipper sticks a little and I am concerned that it won't work great over time, but for now it seems to be OK. I have an obsession with cashmere and this is my new favorite piece. I got it to replace a JCrew one that I had worn till the elbows rubbed through. This one is significantly less expensive that that one was new but feels similar in quality. Overall I am glad I got it. Read more
items.author: Mother of two

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You must own this cashmere hoody or you will never forgive yourself.
items.body: I originally purchased this tangerine cashmere hoody for my daughter in law. Then I thought I should buy a more expensive cashmere and bought one in royal navy . They arrived the same day and I was shocked at the loveliness of the cashmere tangerine. It’s gorgeous. I have purchased 16 cashmere sweaters for this daughter in law over the years and have lost count of the number I own. So I see myself as an expert cashmere buyer. The cut and quality of this hoody is perfect. I ordered a size up so it would be slouchy. I want to keep the navy one, but don’t need it since I live in Florida. I will return it tomorrow before I can change my mind. I have a new daughter-in-law and I am starting her cashmere collection. She has never owned cashmere and doesn’t know how you feel when you slip into a cloud of cashmere. I ended up keeping the navy cashmere and also purchased another tangerine for myself. Now I’m going to order another cashmere hoody for my daughter-in-law for Christmas and one for myself. My belief is you cannot have too many cashmere sweaters. She is an on air journalist in Ohio and has received compliments for her vast collection of cashmere. She looks gorgeous in her bright colors. My other daughter-in-law is a 911 dispatcher in Ohio and her cashmere keeps her warm. I’ve written too much but think your cashmere sweaters are beyond compare. Read more
items.author: T. Lazar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars worth the price, doesn't hold on to smells, size stays true
items.body: great, worth it gets softer with wear size stays true doesn't stretch where you don't want it to but still stretchy enough to be comfy doesn't hold onto smells easy to clean but you dont need to really clean it much if you air dry in the sun between wears use it for running in cold weather its perfect, stays warm when wet and never smells like sweat Read more
items.author: kat

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost perfect
items.body: Great cashmere sweater, soft and warm. Love the two way zipper and the colors are wonderful, I have three! But, the pockets are a problem, they’re angled wrong so even the smallest object, like a chapstick falls out every time. Remedy the pockets and it’s a full five stars. Suggest changing it to a four corner deeper pocket or just bring the bottom outside corner up another inch. Read more
items.author: Not as described, got a mini travel size pillow!

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't fall in love with it
items.body: And for the very high price tag, I really needed to LOVE this sweater to keep it. I have been wearing cashmere sweaters almost exclusively for many years now. I have more expensive cashmere and less. I was searching for a black cashmere hoodie and was willing to splurge if I loved it. For me, this sweater does not meet expectations for the price. It is a very nice hoodie cashmere sweater that was flattering when I tried it on, but for me it is not worth close to $200. I did size up one size (I tend to be a large medium or a small large LOL if that makes sense), but after reading the reviews I ordered a XL. It fit perfectly, smooth and straight with no area too tight or too baggy. I probably would have kept it if it was half the price. Read more
items.author: bethany2601

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good style OK cashmere
items.body: I love the style and quality of the construction. Not the softest but very warm. I’ve purchased Jenny Lui sweaters before and always have been pleased. True to size and mine is a nice dark royal blue not traditional navy and I like the color very much. Good value. Read more
items.author: Pelicanbrief

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars poor quality
items.body: The Cashmere sweater I bought is very disappointed. 1) The quality is rough , Cashmere supposes smooth and soft. I think may be new. then I wore twice, I still feel the roughness I could not tolerated even I had a thick long sleeve shirt under. 2) After I wore at first time , I found three openings between the hoodie and the collar. then I sewed them by hand, I though I may work. 3)There is zipper problem. it is a very bad quality plastic zipper . I was panic when I was unable to zip up the sweater in the cold day. it spends almost 20-30 minutes to figure out to zip up. Although it finally has zipped. That was bad experience. Read more
items.author: Peace

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Petal Pink, Sky, Navy, Oceanblue, Aqua, Cream, Chocolate, Black, Oatmeal, Grey, Charcoal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
